_header: Saint Ignatius the holy man well was with Jesu Christ
Subjects: saints’ lives; Ignatius, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Ignatius in one MS of the South English Legendary — couplet

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint ignas þe holiman wel was with ihesu cristsein Iones deciple he was þe holi euangelist…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …as hi beþ in cherche iwist botning forto doto þulke ioie god ous bring þat his soule wente to
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xCviii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 272v).

Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
